metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35518 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
When binding against a DN during authentication, the reply from 389-ds-base will be different whether the DN exists or not. This can be used by an unauthenticated attacker to check the existence of an entry in the LDAP database.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-35518` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.4.11-2build1
389-ds-base - 1.4.4.11-2build1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.4.11-2build1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.4.11-2build1
python3-lib389 - 1.4.4.11-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.4.11-2build1').
